article.name: malediction
article.contents:
--- class: Thaumaturgist name: Curse school: Curse rank: 2 type: Debilitation brief: Curse an enemy with vulnerability, lethargy, or distraction ---
At-will, std, ranged, 2 vitae; you lay a curse upon the subject. Choose one: - Curse of Vulnerability: choose one damage type (e.g. fire, slashing, etc). Subject gains vulnerability to that damage type. Str or Cha ends. - Curse of Lethargy: subject's movement speed is halved. Instead of being able to take a std, swift, and move action each round, subject must pick 2 and lose the 3rd. Dex or Int ends. - Curse of Distraction: subject has trouble concentration. When initiating a concentration power, or starting a turn with one active, they must pass a concentration check (Wis save) or lose concentration. Con or Wis ends.

  • Curse of Vulnerability: choose one damage type (e.g. fire, slashing, etc). Subject gains vulnerability to that damage type. Str or Cha ends.
  • Curse of Lethargy: subject's movement speed is halved. Instead of being able to take a std, swift, and move action each round, subject must pick 2 and lose the 3rd. Dex or Int ends.
  • Curse of Distraction: subject has trouble concentration. When initiating a concentration power, or starting a turn with one active, they must pass a concentration check (Wis save) or lose concentration. Con or Wis ends.
